quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
name: Og Mandino

quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
name: Henry Ford

quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
name: Donald Trump

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.
name: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: A man who has never made a woman angry is a failure in life.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: Honesty is the fastest way to prevent a mistake from turning into a failure.
name: James Altucher

quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: Success is simply a matter of luck. Ask any failure.
name: Earl Wilson

quote: Without failure there is no achievement.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
name: Bill Gates

quote: You have to be able to accept failure to get better.
name: LeBron James

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: There is no innovation and creativity without failure. Period.
name: Brene Brown

quote: Failure comes only when we forget our ideals and objectives and principles.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Your attitude towards failure determines your altitude after failure.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: Success breeds complacency. Complacency breeds failure. Only the paranoid survive.
name: Andy Grove

quote: Failure doesn't mean you are a failure it just means you haven't succeeded yet.
name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: We have forty million reasons for failure, but not a single excuse.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
name: John Wooden

quote: Success and failure are both part of life. Both are not permanent.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul.
name: Douglas MacArthur

quote: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
name: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
name: Aisha Tyler

quote: Failure at some point in your life is inevitable, but giving up is unforgivable.
name: Joe Biden

quote: Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward toward success.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else.
name: John Burroughs

quote: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
name: Buddha

quote: If you want to increase your success rate, double your failure rate.
name: Thomas J. Watson

quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
name: James Joyce

quote: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate.
name: George Burns

quote: The difference between average people and achieving people is their perception of and response to failure.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
name: Confucius

quote: Ambition is the last refuge of the failure.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: If we don't succeed we run the risk of failure.
name: Dan Quayle

quote: Failure is a word unknown to me.
name: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: We failed, but in the good providence of God apparent failure often proves a blessing.
name: Robert E. Lee

quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.
name: Charlie Chaplin

quote: I fell off my pink cloud with a thud.
name: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: If something's important enough, you should try. Even if you - the probable outcome is failure.
name: Elon Musk

quote: An essential aspect of creativity is not being afraid to fail.
name: Edwin Land

quote: Socialism in general has a record of failure so blatant that only an intellectual could ignore or evade it.
name: Thomas Sowell

quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Every stumble is not a fall, and every fall does not mean failure.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Failure is not an option. Everyone has to succeed.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Failure to prepare is preparing to fail.
name: Mike Murdock

quote: We climb to heaven most often on the ruins of our cherished plans, finding our failures were successes.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: All the world loves a good loser.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: Success is due to our stretching to the challenges of life. Failure comes when we shrink from them.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: Do not fear mistakes. You will know failure. Continue to reach out.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Failure is a detour, not a dead-end street.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
name: Richard Branson

quote: I've had a lot of success; I've had failures, so I learn from the failure.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
name: Malcolm Forbes

quote: It's not necessary to fear the prospect of failure but to be determined not to fail.
name: Jimmy Carter

quote: If you fall during your life, it doesn't matter. You're never a failure as long as you try to get up.
name: Evel Knievel

quote: Failure is not our only punishment for laziness; there is also the success of others.
name: Jules Renard

quote: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: There is no such thing as failure. There are only results.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: One of the reasons people stop learning is that they become less and less willing to risk failure.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: If you learn from defeat, you haven't really lost.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Elegance is not a dispensable luxury but a factor that decides between success and failure.
name: Edsger Dijkstra

quote: Success comes when people act together; failure tends to happen alone.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Show me a thoroughly satisfied man and I will show you a failure.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Failure means a stripping away of the inessential.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Failure happens all the time. It happens every day in practice. What makes you better is how you react to it.
name: Mia Hamm

quote: Show me a good and gracious loser and I'll show you a failure.
name: Knute Rockne

quote: Failure is good. It's fertilizer. Everything I've learned about coaching, I've learned from making mistakes.
name: Rick Pitino

quote: There are some defeats more triumphant than victories.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: A failure establishes only this, that our determination to succeed was not strong enough.
name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: If you try to do your best there is no failure.
name: Mike Farrell

quote: Man is not made for defeat.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The guns and the bombs, the rockets and the warships, are all symbols of human failure.
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
name: James Cameron

quote: My life has been nothing but a failure.
name: Claude Monet

quote: It is in our genes that we think of breaking up when we love and of failure and fall when we succeed.
name: RM

quote: Enjoy failure and learn from it. You can never learn from success.
name: James Dyson

quote: Success is more dangerous than failure, the ripples break over a wider coastline.
name: Graham Greene

quote: Success is never final, but failure can be.
name: Bill Parcells

quote: A hatred of failure has always been part of my nature.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: Success is 99 percent failure.
name: Soichiro Honda

quote: So many financial dreams are thwarted by the failure to act upon good intentions.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
name: Truman Capote

quote: Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.
name: John Wooden

quote: I firmly believe that unless one has tasted the bitter pill of failure, one cannot aspire enough for success.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I don't believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Failure is nature's plan to prepare you for great responsibilities.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success isn't permanent and failure isn't fatal.
name: Mike Ditka

quote: In all our deeds, the proper value and respect for time determines success or failure.
name: Malcolm X

quote: Failure is impossible.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Fear of failure, it's the greatest motivational tool. It drives me and drives me and drives me.
name: Jerry West

quote: Indecision and delays are the parents of failure.
name: George Canning

quote: Engineering is achieving function while avoiding failure.
name: Henry Petroski

quote: My fault, my failure, is not in the passions I have, but in my lack of control of them.
name: Jack Kerouac

quote: Success and failure are equally disastrous.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: To err is human, but it feels divine.
name: Mae West

quote: I don't want the fear of failure to stop me from doing what I really care about.
name: Emma Watson

quote: You make mistakes. Mistakes don't make you.
name: Maxwell Maltz

quote: In our business, things look like a failure until they're not. It's pretty binary transitions.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: A love of nature is a consolation against failure.
name: Berthe Morisot

quote: We may be personally defeated, but our principles never!
name: William Lloyd Garrison

quote: Fear of failure must never be a reason not to try something.
name: Frederick W. Smith

quote: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities.
name: Walter Scott

quote: There's no such thing as failure - just waiting for success.
name: John Osborne

quote: They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.
name: James Allen

quote: We dissect failure a lot more than we dissect success.
name: Matthew McConaughey

quote: Failure is an enigma. You worry about it, and it teaches you something.
name: James Dyson

quote: Failure is always an option.
name: Adam Savage

quote: I was in kidney failure. I ended up having a kidney transplant on my 21st birthday.
name: Amy Purdy

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
name: Suzy Kassem

quote: As an outside; don't worry about failure, because failure will take care of itself. Focus on success.
name: Henry Cavill

quote: Risk is to do something that 99 percent of the time would be a failure.
name: Ferran Adria

quote: A failure will not appear until a unit has passed final inspection.
name: Arthur Bloch

quote: Success unshared is failure.
name: John Paul DeJoria

quote: I'm living life as best I can - but I'm not exempt from failure and making bad choices.
name: LeAnn Rimes

quote: Don't be afraid of failure; be afraid of petty success.
name: Maude Adams

quote: If we don't succeed, we run the risk of failure.
name: Al Gore

quote: Do not blame anybody for your mistakes and failures.
name: Bernard Baruch

quote: Who I am as a guitarist is defined by my failure to become Jimi Hendrix.
name: John Mayer

quote: Success is not forever and failure isn't fatal.
name: Don Shula

quote: Students rarely disappoint teachers who assure them in advance that they are doomed to failure.
name: Sidney Hook

quote: The dream is real, my friends. The failure to realize it is the only unreality.
name: Toni Cade Bambara

quote: Failure seldom stops you. What stops you is the fear of failure.
name: Jack Lemmon

quote: The idea of capitalism is not just success but also the failure that allows success to happen.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I don't lose any sleep at night over the potential for failure. I cannot even spell the word.
name: Jim Mattis

quote: You always pass failure on your way to success.
name: Mickey Rooney

quote: I really do think that putting expectations on a holiday is setting yourself up for failure.
name: Delilah

quote: Philanthropic colonization is a failure. National colonization will succeed.
name: Theodor Herzl

quote: A Failure in this Duty did once involve our Nation in all the Horrors of Rebellion and Civil War.
name: Charles Inglis

quote: All war represents a failure of diplomacy.
name: Tony Benn

quote: But while success and failure depend on conditions, the mind neither waxes nor wanes.
name: Bodhidharma

quote: Education is the only billion dollar industry that tolerates abject failure.
name: Geoffrey Canada

quote: Before you can win a game, you have to not lose it.
name: Chuck Noll

quote: Yes, 'Aagadu' was a failure. I was dejected for a couple of months, since there was a lot at stake.
name: Mahesh Babu

quote: War is the greatest failure of mankind.
name: Aaron Huey

quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Why should anybody be interested in some old man who was a failure?
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
name: George Edward Woodberry

quote: In America, there's a failure to appreciate Europe's leading role in the world.
name: Barack Obama

quote: There is but one cause of human failure. And that is man's lack of faith in his true Self.
name: William James

quote: When I was young, I observed that nine out of ten things I did were failures. So I did ten times more work.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: My reputation grows with every failure.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Never fret for an only son, the idea of failure will never occur to him.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: How one handles success or failure is determined by their early childhood.
name: Harold Ramis

quote: Failure is simply a few errors in judgment, repeated every day.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
name: Colin R. Davis

quote: He who risks and fails can be forgiven. He who never risks and never fails is a failure in his whole being.
name: Paul Tillich

quote: No man is a failure who is enjoying life.
name: William Feather

quote: My father was not a failure. After all, he was the father of a president of the United States.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: The wisest of the wise may err.
name: Aeschylus

quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I think you can have 10,000 explanations for failure, but no good explanation for success.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: Failure is never fatal. But failure to change can and might be.
name: John Wooden

quote: Ultimately there is no such thing as failure. There are lessons learned in different ways.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: Progress requires setbacks; the only sure way to avoid failure is not to try.
name: Henry Spencer

quote: The only real failure in life is one not learned from.
name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: The only real failure is giving up.
name: Scooter Braun

quote: If there exists no possibility of failure, then victory is meaningless.
name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Life is bigger than cinema. Cinema is just a part of life, so I never take success or failure seriously.
name: Pawan Kalyan

quote: I've had my share of struggle. I believe, never take success to your head or failure to your heart.
name: Randeep Hooda

quote: With improvisation, I just do it. It might be a total failure but then you just throw the dice again.
name: Christian Marclay

quote: Intemperance and intolerance serve no one, and hatred guarantees failure.
name: Edward Brooke

quote: There is not a fiercer hell than the failure in a great object.
name: John Keats

quote: However things may seem, no evil thing is success and no good thing is failure.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: A traveller must buy his own experience, and success or failure depends mainly on personal idiosyncrasies.
name: Isabella Bird

quote: All human actions are equivalent and all are on principle doomed to failure.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Destiny: A tyrant's authority for crime and a fool's excuse for failure.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: There is only one failure in life possible, and that is not to be true to the best one knows.
name: George Eliot

quote: My fears are never about failure - it's about extreme success.
name: Lil Dicky

quote: No man can be a failure if he thinks he's a success; If he thinks he is a winner, then he is.
name: Robert W. Service

quote: I love language, and I love the failure of language.
name: Nate Lowman

quote: In politics, what begins in fear usually ends in failure.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Optimism is a kind of heart stimulant - the digitalis of failure.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Even as far back as when I started acting at 14, I know I've never considered failure.
name: Jennifer Lawrence

quote: The only failure one should fear, is not hugging to the purpose they see as best.
name: George Eliot

quote: Failure is the most terrible thing in our business. When we fail, the whole world knows about it.
name: Desi Arnaz

quote: Failure is an amazing data point that tells you which direction not to go.
name: Payal Kadakia

quote: A failure doesn't mean you are unworthy, nor does it preclude success on the next try.
name: Leonard Mlodinow

quote: The surest way to fail is not to determine to succeed.
name: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quote: We all struggle with our failure to communicate and our failure to reach beyond fear to love people.
name: Mira Sorvino

quote: A failure is a man who has blundered, but is not able to cash in the experience.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Whether in success or in failure, I'm proud of every single movie I've ever directed.
name: Steven Spielberg

quote: Some teachers feel that if they ask for emotional help, they're a failure. But teaching is a team sport.
name: Erin Gruwell

quote: Without exposure to potential failure, there is no risk.
name: Brennan Manning

quote: Do not let your ambitions become a sanctuary for your failures.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Belief in the supernatural reflects a failure of the imagination.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: The most important lesson to remember is that failure is inevitable, but so is success, so rebound.
name: Naveen Tewari

quote: Our best successes often come after our greatest disappointments.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: There's no right or wrong, success or failure.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: Crime and bad lives are the measure of a State's failure, all crime in the end is the crime of the community.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: We have to provide more visibility, more certainty to the investors and reduce the cost of failure.
name: Emmanuel Macron

quote: The only failure is not to try.
name: George Clooney

quote: Not failure, but low aim is sin.
name: Benjamin E. Mays

quote: Once you can accept failure, you can have fun and success.
name: Rickey Henderson

quote: I was very afraid of failure because if you fail at something you love, then you ruin what you love.
name: Kimbal Musk

quote: The Bay of Pigs became a metaphor for feckless folly and failure.
name: Pat Buchanan

quote: It is easier to win than to fail. Everybody sides with the winner. But the failure walks alone.
name: George Matthew Adams

quote: There are many victories worse than a defeat.
name: George Eliot

quote: You gotta lose 'em some of the time. When you do, lose 'em right.
name: Casey Stengel

quote: The first thing successful people do is view failure as a positive signal to success.
name: Brendon Burchard

quote: I think the fall in Eden was ultimately a failure to give thanks.
name: Ann Voskamp

quote: We create success or failure on the course primarily by our thoughts.
name: Gary Player

quote: The will to persevere is often the difference between failure and success.
name: David Sarnoff

quote: There could be no honor in a sure success, but much might be wrested from a sure defeat.
name: Ann Landers

quote: Success represents the 1% of your work which results from the 99% that is called failure.
name: Soichiro Honda

quote: Without failure there is no sweetness in success. There's no understanding of it.
name: Glenn Beck

quote: It is not a disgrace to fail. Failing is one of the greatest arts in the world.
name: Charles Kettering

quote: The most important of my discoveries have been suggested to me by my failures.
name: Humphry Davy

quote: Ambitious failure, magnificent failure, is a very good thing.
name: Guy Kawasaki

quote: Testing leads to failure, and failure leads to understanding.
name: Burt Rutan

quote: I think success has no rules, but you can learn a great deal from failure.
name: Jean Kerr

quote: The failure to invest in youth reflects a lack of compassion and a colossal failure of common sense.
name: Coretta Scott King

quote: It's your own fear of failure that stops you from doing things.
name: Anupam Kher

quote: You cannot learn anything from success, you only learn from failure.
name: Jim Dale

quote: Learning starts with failure; the first failure is the beginning of education.
name: John Hersey

quote: Success breeds success, and failure leads to a sort of fallow period.
name: Felicity Kendal

quote: The failure of credit markets is one of the major reasons for underdevelopment.
name: George Akerlof

quote: It takes two to make a marriage a success and only one to make it a failure.
name: Herbert Samuel

quote: War remains the decisive human failure.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: About the only problem with success is that it does not teach you how to deal with failure.
name: Tommy Lasorda

quote: The only risk of failure is promotion.
name: Scott Adams

quote: A minute's success pays the failure of years.
name: Robert Browning

quote: The great question is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with failure.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: There is no loneliness greater than the loneliness of a failure. The failure is a stranger in his own house.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: Success is more difficult to handle than failure.
name: Ravi Zacharias

quote: Failure to accord credit to anyone for what he may have done is a great weakness in any man.
name: William Howard Taft

quote: Not failure, but low aim, is crime.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: Sometimes the best lighting of all is a power failure.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Sometimes the best gain is to lose.
name: George Herbert

quote: It's not about the failure, it's about learning from the failures. Failure itself cannot be celebrated.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: A life which does not go into action is a failure.
name: Arnold J. Toynbee

quote: I think my whole life, because of where I came from, I had a fear of failure.
name: Howard Schultz

quote: There are people who say that you can't experiment... That condemns you to failure.
name: Jose Mujica

quote: Don't come home a failure.
name: Ty Cobb

quote: You don't go into anything contemplating failure, because if you did, you wouldn't make it.
name: Simon Cowell

quote: The man who has done his level best... is a success, even though the world may write him down a failure.
name: B. C. Forbes

quote: The man who has won millions at the cost of his conscience is a failure.
name: B. C. Forbes

quote: In Iraq we must succeed. Failure is not an option.
name: Zbigniew Brzezinski

quote: I'm drawn to failure. I feel like I'm contending with it constantly in my own life.
name: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: If you're so afraid of failure, you will never succeed. You have to take chances.
name: Mario Andretti

quote: I assume everything I do in life is gonna be a failure, and then if it turns up roses, then I'm psyched.
name: Jonah Hill

quote: By virtually any measure, the record of the Republican Majority is an appalling failure.
name: Sheila Jackson Lee

quote: Translation is the art of failure.
name: Umberto Eco

quote: If you aren't learning, you are regressing, because more growth comes from failure than from success.
name: Shahid Khan

quote: People never confess to failure. They should.
name: Mo Ibrahim

quote: It's how you deal with failure that determines how you achieve success.
name: Charlotte Whitton

quote: The exposed nature of life in the public square affects leaders' attitudes toward risk - and failure.
name: Dee Dee Myers

quote: Success and failure go hand in hand.
name: Sangram Singh

quote: At least I have the modesty to admit that lack of modesty is one of my failings.
name: Hector Berlioz

quote: The thing I always say to people is this: 'If you avoid failure, you also avoid success.'
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Definitely, it's a fear of failure that drives me.
name: Jerry Bruckheimer

quote: Outward failure may be a manifested variant of inward success.
name: Kenneth L. Pike

quote: The human spirit is so resilient, and failure teaches you so much.
name: Molly Bloom

quote: Every failure is a step to success.
name: William Whewell

quote: I find rejection or failure to be a really interesting and valuable experience.
name: Brian Grazer

quote: Every individual suffers from the fear of failure, but you can change your destiny only when you overcome it.
name: Anupam Kher

quote: I'm finding that success is way more time-consuming than failure ever was.
name: Emma Donoghue

quote: I believe there's only one regulation in life that works: failure.
name: Rick Santelli

quote: It is wise to keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.
name: Roger Babson

quote: Failure and its accompanying misery is for the artist his most vital source of creative energy.
name: Montgomery Clift

quote: Mike DeWine has been a dismal failure as Ohio's top cop.
name: Richard Cordray

quote: Failure is not a crime. The crime is not trying.
name: Ron Dellums

quote: I wasn't afraid to fail. Something good always comes out of failure.
name: Anne Baxter

quote: I think you can learn as much from success as you can from failure.
name: Corey Hart

quote: Success and failure are equally surprising.
name: Daryl Hall

quote: Success is often built on the shoulders of failure - from which new configurations emerge.
name: Kevin Reilly

quote: Spend enough time around success and failure, and you learn a reverence for possibility.
name: Dale Dauten

quote: When you're fearless, you take more risks because you're less conscious of failure or what can go wrong.
name: Brett Ratner

quote: The pressures are intense, because the rewards for success and the penalty for failure are more and more.
name: Alan Hansen

quote: Most leadership strategies are doomed to failure from the outset.
name: Peter Senge

quote: Failure is inevitable; it happens all the time in a complex economy.
name: Tim Harford

quote: The reality of most software development is that the consequences of failure are simply nonexistent.
name: Dan Kaminsky

quote: Pentathlon is not a sign of my failure in swimming. It's a new start for me.
name: Elodie Clouvel

quote: I didn't fear failure. I expected failure.
name: Amy Tan

quote: Adam Smith's huge failure was the fact that he did not foresee the industrial revolution.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Ideology, politics and journalism, which luxuriate in failure, are impotent in the face of hope and joy.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I believe in trusting men, not only once but twice - in giving a failure another chance.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: All human actions are equivalent... and all are on principle doomed to failure.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Success needs no explanation. Failure does not have one that matters.
name: Jesse Jackson

quote: It is often the failure who is the pioneer in new lands, new undertakings, and new forms of expression.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: A real failure does not need an excuse. It is an end in itself.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: I think you have to try and fail, because failure gets you closer to what you're good at.
name: Louis C. K.

quote: Success is usually the culmination of controlling failure.
name: Sylvester Stallone

quote: I've accepted that I was a failure in politics. I was not qualified for the job.
name: Amitabh Bachchan

quote: I may be a successful football player, but I feel like such a failure.
name: Brett Favre

quote: I read less and less. I have not forgiven books for their failure to tell me the truth and make me happy.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Greatly begin. Though thou have time, but for a line, be that sublime. Not failure, but low aim is crime.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: My biggest failure is I have too many to talk about.
name: Dean Kamen

quote: My feeling, based on my own experience, is that aiming for grandiosity is the fastest route to failure.
name: James Altucher

quote: Sometimes failure isn't an opportunity in disguise, it's just you.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: If a building looks better under construction than it does when finished, then it's a failure.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Failure has gone to his head.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: I feel that marriage can lead to the ultimate rejection and failure and divorce and things we all fear.
name: Mike Birbiglia

quote: Failure too is a form of death.
name: Graham Greene

quote: I like the possibility of failure. I don't want to be in a comfortable zone.
name: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: I feel, in the end, as if everything I've done has been a failure.
name: Jonathan Kozol

quote: Those who refuse to liberalise and globalise are doomed to failure.
name: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: Pride is ugly. It says, 'If you succeed, I am a failure.'
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Coming to terms with the fact that my marriage was a failure was devastating and very difficult.
name: Sarah McLachlan

quote: If at first you don't succeed, failure may be your style.
name: Quentin Crisp

quote: Admitting failure is quite cleansing, but never - pleasurable.
name: Michael Morpurgo

quote: I want to swim in both directions at once. Desire success, court failure.
name: Alan Rickman

quote: The British health care system is a blueprint for the failure of Obamacare, as it is structured.
name: Marsha Blackburn

quote: Failure is more frequently from want of energy than want of capital.
name: Daniel Webster

quote: If my child had prejudice in his head, I'd be ashamed. I would see it as my failure as a parent.
name: Salman Rushdie

quote: If you're not a born-again Christian, you're a failure as a human being.
name: Jerry Falwell

quote: What America does best is produce the ability to accept failure.
name: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quote: Boston has carried the practice of hypocrisy to the n-th degree of refinement, grace, and failure.
name: Lincoln Steffens

quote: I never see failure as failure, but only as the game I must play and win.
name: Tom Hopkins

quote: Revolutionaries were depressed and close to emotional breakdown; after the failure, they left successively.
name: Sun Yat-sen

quote: I think I'm less afraid of failure than some others.
name: Russell Simmons

quote: Never walk away from failure. On the contrary, study it carefully and imaginatively for its hidden assets.
name: Michael Korda

quote: Defeat may serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out.
name: Edwin Markham

quote: Call it the Tiger Mom effect: In the business world today, failure is apparently not an option.
name: Naveen Jain

quote: Sometimes we never see what failure is and often fail to recognize it.
name: Naveen Jain

quote: Remember what Susan B. Anthony said? 'Failure is impossible.' Failure is possible if women don't vote.
name: Madeleine M. Kunin

quote: Feminism is doomed to failure because it is based on an attempt to repeal and restructure human nature.
name: Phyllis Schlafly

quote: Pure unadulterated success is not as funny as failure.
name: Will Arnett

quote: I have tried every diet to lose weight. When you restrict yourself, you're setting yourself up for failure.
name: Octavia Spencer

quote: Failure. It doesn't exist. 'Failure' is just what happens when we lose perspective.
name: Donna Brazile

quote: Failure sometimes enlarges the spirit. You have to fall back upon humanity and God.
name: Charles Horton Cooley

quote: Failure is simply the non-presence of success. But a fiasco is a disaster of mythic proportions.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: There's a difference between a failure and a fiasco... a fiasco is a disaster of mythic proportions.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: I realized that I was afraid to really, really try something, 100%, because I had never reached true failure.
name: Trent Reznor

quote: When you accept that failure is a good thing, it can actually be a huge propeller toward success.
name: Whitney Wolfe Herd

quote: When you can look at failure and say, 'What is the worst case scenario,' it's not as bad as it seems.
name: Whitney Wolfe Herd

quote: I don't understand a way to work other than bold-facedly running towards failure.
name: Cate Blanchett

quote: Failure is a part of success.
name: Hank Aaron

quote: Tasting failure, even when you truly believe in a project, is a critical part of the growth process.
name: Daniel Lubetzky

quote: For me, utter failure is to make a film that people pay their money to go see and they don't like.
name: Peter Jackson

quote: Don't think of it as failure. Think of it as time-released success.
name: Robert Orben

quote: I feel rejecting rejection is one of the most crucial steps in getting past failure.
name: John Rampton

quote: The failure to set standards for Palestinian conduct hurts the cause of peace.
name: Elliott Abrams

quote: Success is a public affair. Failure is a private funeral.
name: Rosalind Russell

quote: Failure will happen. It's a normal part of the startup process.
name: Steve Blank

quote: Try not to say, 'I'm a failure.' Instead, ask, 'What can I do better? What did I do wrong?' Then re-approach.
name: Jillian Michaels

quote: It's a European Union of economic failure, of mass unemployment and of low growth.
name: Nigel Farage

quote: Civilization is a failure. We need to think what we can do together in love and peace.
name: Serj Tankian

quote: Being a pathfinder is to be willing to risk failure and still go on.
name: Gail Sheehy

quote: Failure doesn't exist. It's only a change of direction.
name: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quote: Our failings sometimes bind us to one another as closely as could virtue itself.
name: Luc de Clapiers

quote: There is no such thing as darkness; only a failure to see.
name: Malcolm Muggeridge

quote: Apple is a failure because they missed social? Nobody would say that, because they are having great success.
name: Steve Ballmer

quote: If anyone has seen success and failure on a global stage, it's my friend Steve Forbes.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: Unwillingness to risk failure is always there, but it gets harder when you feel you have more to lose.
name: Demi Moore

quote: Well, I think it's too early to call Fallujah a failure.
name: Chuck Schumer

quote: Government doesn't have a high tolerance for failure.
name: John Hickenlooper

quote: The only reason my work seems to be eclectic up to a certain period is because I was a failure as an actor.
name: Hugh Grant

quote: He who has conquered doubt and fear has conquered failure.
name: James Lane Allen

quote: A fictionalised memoir of my father would be a failure as a novel.
name: Richard Flanagan

quote: I don't have any fear of failure whatsoever. I used to, and I told myself I wouldn't allow myself to anymore.
name: Jaylen Brown

quote: I constantly experience failure in that my work is never as good as I want it to be. So I live with failure.
name: Jeremy Irons

quote: There are no mistakes, save one: the failure to learn from a mistake.
name: Robert Fripp

quote: I wish I had been more prepared, both for success and for failure, when I was younger.
name: Molly Ringwald

quote: I was convicted of three misdemeanors of willful failure to file a form.
name: Wesley Snipes

quote: I think I've failed every test I've ever taken. If there was a failure I would have been it.
name: Lisa Marie Presley

quote: Sometimes people call me a success for all the reasons that make me think I'm a failure.
name: William Hurt

quote: I've always believed that it's important to show a new look periodically. Predictability can lead to failure.
name: T. Boone Pickens

quote: The hippy movement was a failure.
name: Joe Strummer

quote: There is much to be said for failure. It is much more interesting than success.
name: Max Beerbohm

quote: Failure usually works for me in the end.
name: David Hasselhoff

quote: I think somehow you need to get to a certain point in your life where the notion of failure is absurd.
name: Jeff Tweedy

quote: Aging is mostly the failure to repair.
name: Gregory Benford

quote: The world is divided into two categories: failures and unknowns.
name: Francis Picabia

quote: One of the biggest problems with the modern feminist movement is its failure to bring men along with us.
name: Tammy Bruce

quote: I just felt that 'Golden Balls' was the right thing to do. I didn't care if people thought I was a failure.
name: Jasper Carrott

quote: Failure is a word that I simply don't accept.
name: John H. Johnson

quote: Anybody who dies with money in the bank is a failure.
name: Dan Gilbert

quote: The probability of failure doesn't matter to me.
name: Vinod Khosla

quote: The way most people fail is in not keeping up the heart.
name: Lady Gregory

quote: Fear of failure has always been my best motivator.
name: Douglas Wood

quote: Losing is no disgrace if you've given your best.
name: Jim Palmer
